original_text: When Jesus stepped ashore, he was met by a demon-possessed man from the town. For a long time this man had not worn clothes or lived in a house, but had lived in the tombs.
korean_text: 예수께서 육지에 내리시매 그 도시 사람으로서 귀신 들린 자 하나가 예수를 만나니 그 사람은 오래 옷을 입지 아니하며 집에 거하지도 아니하고 무덤 사이에 거하는 자라

sentences.original_text: he was met by a demon-possessed man
For a long time this man had not worn clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 오랫동안 이 사람은 옷을 입지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: but had lived in the tombs.
